advisory.title: Advisory Levels
advisory.level_3: Avoid Unnecessary Travel To This Destination
advisory.level_4: Travel To This Destination Is Prohibited. Those Who Are Already There Must Leave Immediately.

tip.label: tip
tip.message: Click on a country to view its official travel advisory on

missing.title: Missing Countries/Territories
missing.count_message: There are {{count}} countries/territories not visible on the map.

about.title: About Azharot
about.description: This application provides a visual map interface to view Israeli government travel warnings.
about.disclaimer_text: This tool is <1>not</1> an official source for government travel warnings. Rely exclusively on the <2>official source</2> before making travel plans.
